activities:
The Way We Use Information:
We use the information you provide about yourself/others when placing an order only to complete that order. We do not share this information with outside parties except to the extent necessary to complete that order.
We use return email addresses to answer the email we receive. Such addresses are not used for any other purpose and are not shared with outside parties.
We use non-identifying and aggregate information to better design our website, but we would not disclose anything that could be used to identify visitors to our site or applications. We gather that non-identifying data and aggregate information via cookies which track the activities of a visitor on our website. 
In the context of compliance with data protection laws it is useful to distinguish between ‘first party’ cookies and ‘third party’ cookies. First party cookies are cookies placed by the operator of the website visited by the user. Scribe Software uses ‘first party’ cookies. These cookies enable Scribe Software to advertise our products and tailor our website experience to the user based on the information gathered by our cookies. Scribe Software is the sole controller of your personal data gathered by our own first party cookies. 
Finally, we never use or share the personally identifiable information provided to us online in ways unrelated to the ones described above without also providing you an opportunity to opt-out or otherwise prohibit such unrelated uses.
